main event: A civilian reported observing a teardrop-shaped, shining object disappearing and appearing in the sky, with a duration of sighting approximately 45 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as shining and tear-drop shaped., The object initially appeared squarish and then became round., The object was the size of a silver dollar and bluish-white., The congressional report speculates the object was probably a balloon., There were multiple reports indicating various shapes and durations of sighting.
witness description: Civilian, First Officer on a Trans-Canada Airlines flight
